int DisturbanceInfoReplyPacket::fillDisturbanceVector (  vector< DisturbanceDescription > &  distVector  ) 
 

Add the return info to the vector.

If the distPoint equals the mapID.nodeID of the returned description that element is updated. If that element already has been updated (multiple disturbances) a new element is added.

Parameters:
vector The vector with disturbances and detours.
Returns:
-1 if failed other wise the number of updated elements.

int DisturbanceInfoReplyPacket::getNextDistID (  uint32 &  mapID,
uint32 &  nodeID,
uint32 &  distID,
int  pos = START_OF_DIST
) 
 

Get the next disturbance.

If no pos value is given this will be the first disturbance. The return value is used as next pos.

Parameters:
@return
